Header: Army Commander Calls on New Secretary Defence
Content: Lieutenant General Mahesh Senanayake, Commander of the Army on Friday (3) paid a courtesy call on the new Secretary to the Ministry of Defence, General S H. Shantha Kottegoda (Retd) at the Ministry of Defence and expressed his cooperation for conduct of his new office. During the cordial meeting, both of them exchanged views on matters of security concern and other related developments. Towards the end of the interaction, the visiting Lieutenant General Mahesh Senanayake presented a memento to the Secretary Defence and extended best wishes on his new appointment.
